strategy.title: Overview
steps: Complete all raid achievements in Naxxramas, Eye of Eternity, and Obsidian Sanctum on 10-player
Most achievements are soloable at max level

strategy.title: Naxxramas Tips
steps: The Immortal requires no raid member deaths - go slow and use self-heals
Arachnophobia: Kill Maexxna within 20 min of pulling Anub'Rekhan - rush spider wing
Make Quick Werk of Him: High DPS check, save cooldowns for Patchwerk
Safety Dance: Stay out of green zones on Heigan - learn the pattern

strategy.title: Obsidian Sanctum
steps: Twilight Zone: Kill Sartharion with all 3 drakes alive
At max level, nuke boss before adds overwhelm you
Use defensive cooldowns when drakes land
